pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptation of the Coloc Method for PheWAS // A Bayesian method for Phenome-wide association studies (PheWAS) that identifies causal associations between genetic variants and traits, while simultaneously addressing confounding due to linkage disequilibrium. For details see Manipur et al (2024, Nature Communications) doi:10.1038/s41467-024-49990-8.
